attributes.action: Set-up a government inquiry into child sexual exploitation in Telford, UK.
attributes.additional_details: In 2016 Telford & Wrekin Council, together with their safeguarding partners, assured the Home Secretary that no inquiry into CSE in Telford was necessary as ‘progress had been made’ and lessons learned.
attributes.background: Recent news report in the media concerning Child Sexual Exploitation in Telford are extremely serious and shocking. There must now be an independent inquiry into CSE in Telford so that our community can have absolute confidence in the authorities.

rejection.details:
There is already an Independent Inquiry on Child Sexual Abuse. 

The Inquiry has announced that it is considering information from Telford and Wrekin Council as part of its investigation. 

You can find out more about the Inquiry here:

https://www.iicsa.org.uk/
